item.title: Sun Pharma Among Biggest Nifty Drags After Broker Downgrade; SEBI RA Sees Support At ₹1,528 - ₹1,552 Range
item.description: BofA Securities reportedly downgraded Sun Pharma’s stock to ‘underperform’ from ‘neutral’ and slashed its target price to ₹1,570 from ₹1,730

item.title: Caterpillar Stock Slips Premarket After Norway’s $2-Trillion Sovereign Fund ‘Excludes’ Firm Over Gaza War Concerns

item.title: Interactive Brokers Climbs, Robinhood Slips Premarket — Here’s What’s Driving The Divergence
item.description: IBKR is set to replace the pharmaceutical retailer Walgreens Boots Alliance in a key benchmark index.

item.title: Japan’s Nikkei, Asahi Sue Perplexity AI For Nearly $15M Over Copyright Breach
item.description: Publishers allege the AI firm bypassed safeguards, scraped servers, and distributed inaccurate summaries in violation of Japan’s Copyright Act.
